script.caption: A sheep looking at the wheels of cheese in a supermarket.

dialogue.text: Behold the enigmatic sheep, creatures shrouded in the lore and legend of yesteryears.

script.caption: A sheep wearing a wizard hat casting magic spells with a ritual circle beneath them in Stonehenge

dialogue.text: For centuries, scholars and mystics have pondered over their serene demeanors and unassuming presence.
What arcane knowledge do they guard beneath their fluffy exteriors?

script.caption: A man looking at sheep eating grass around a field.

dialogue.text: Join us, as we unravel the ancient mystery of the sheep.
